name: Matt Liaw
description: Liaw is a formercorpowho worked forMilitechand later became amercworking for Mercenary Solutions Inc. During his time at Militech, he was deployed during theSecond Central American War, where he stepped onto a mine in Panama. After being laid off, he also lost his health insurancy policy PTSD SHIELD. Later, he would also be evicted by the Bank of Night City from his apartment on 12 Milagro Terrace after repeatedly not meeting payments. Withouteddiesand without a roof over his head and still having obsolete cyberware installed, he started the early stages ofcyberpsychosis. In a desperate...
